content: do you have a rooting tooting cowboy in your life that needs a hat to wear whist they remind you the sofa isn t big enough for the two of you this hat pattern comes with optional strings to let your cat take it off when they re no longer interested in rustling sheep this is a great beginner pattern to practice making wearable clothes on a small scale with small amounts of dk yarn a 4mm crochet hook and is worked in one piece the hat is designed for an adult cat and is 12cm long 12cm wide and 2 5cm tall
